meaningMnemonic: The <radical>fish</radical> and <radical>sheep</radical> are very <kanji>fresh</kanji> here. This is a great place to get fresh fish and fresh sheep. I kid you not.
readingMnemonic: This place also serves <kanji>fresh</kanji> <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん), but that’s just weird. Centaur is endangered and you don’t believe in eating endangered things. Even if they are incredibly fresh.
